Class EigenFaceFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.processing.face.feature.EigenFaceFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

public class EigenFaceFeature
extends Object
implements FacialFeature, FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>
    A FacialFeature for EigenFaces.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
